item.title: Help How do i change
item.dc:creator: @p_e_e_p_z_i p e e p z i
item.description:
@p_e_e_p_z_i wrote:

I think hold on…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 21, 2008, 05:46:41 pm[/size][hr]Lol thats actually a emote anyways here it is do ::emote (id)

[code]

402 - Dragon Dagger stab emote
403 - Block with shield defensive emote
404 - Block no shield defensive emote
405 - Dragon spear special
406 - 2h crush style emote
407 - 2h slash style emote
408 - Scythe ‘REAP’ attack style
410 - Defensive block when 2h weapon equiped
412 - Stab
422 - PUNCH
423 - KICK
424 - Fore-arm block
440 - Halberd “Slash” attack style
451 - Slash attack style (longsword, shortsword, ect.)
1060 - drag mace spec
1658 - Whip attack
1659 - Whip block
1660 - Whip walk
1661 - Whip run
1662 - Granite Maul stand
1663 - Granite Maul walk
1664 - Granite Maul run
1665 - Granite maul attack
1666 - Granite Maul block
1667 - Granite Maul special
1833 - drag baxe attack
2316 - standing holding toad shooter (fixed defice)
2318 - walking holding toad shooter
2323 - kick attack while wielding fixed device
2876 - DRAG AXE SPEC!!
2890 - DARKLIGHT SPEC!
2910 - spinning something and then throwing it
2927 - twirling weapon then hitting something
3157 - Dragon 2h special[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Help How do i change
item.dc:creator: @p_e_e_p_z_i p e e p z i
item.description:
@p_e_e_p_z_i wrote:

Open up you client.java and search godsword you should see somthing like this

public void calculateSpecial() { if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9036 && specialAmount <= 99) {// Saradomin godsword specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9036 && specialAmount >= 100) {// Saradomin godsword startAnimation(2890); // Normal 2h emote, change if you want. saradominSpec(); hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(5); specialAmount -= 50;
Do you see startAnimation(2890); // Normal 2h emote, change if you want. thats the animation.

Read full topic
